dcterms:creator: Loic Matthey
Irina Higgins
Demis Hassabis
Alexander Lerchner
dcterms:description: ColorDSprites is a color-augmented version of the DSprites dataset, which comprises a comprehensive set of symbolic objects generated with variations in five latent variables: shape, scale, orientation, and X-Y position. It allows for the examination of shortcut biases in a highly controlled setup.
dcterms:title: ColorDSprites

dcterms:creator: Zhifei Zhang
Yang Song
Hairong Qi
dcterms:description: UTKFace provides a dataset of 33,488 facial images annotated with attributes like age, gender, and ethnicity. It presents a real-world, less controlled setup to study bias, making it an ideal candidate for understanding model cue preferences when societal and ethical concerns are at stake.
dcterms:title: UTKFace
